text: Tito Stagno (4 January 1930 – 1 February 2022) was an Italian journalist, television writer and presenter. Stagno started his career as a sports commentator in Radio Cagliari and as a reporter in Radiosera.Aldo Grasso, Massimo Scaglioni. "Stagno, Tito". Enciclopedia della Televisione. Garzanti, Milano, 1996 – 2003. p. 699. . In 1954 he began working for RAI. He is best known for being the commentator of the 1969 moon landing. Stagno died on 1 February 2022 in Rome, at the age of 92. == References == Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Italian journalists Category:Italian television presenters Category:People from Cagliari
title: Tito Stagno
